summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3171, for the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue South from Lander Street to Beacon Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38882 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
